backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of footer attribution text and listing affected file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for various frontend files detailing styling, components, and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing layout, background, header, content sections, footer, floating buttons, and scheme modal.
frontend/src/components/background/Cinem: Full‑screen autoplaying background video with gradient and vignette overlays.
frontend/src/components/calculator/LiveC: Interactive financial calculator adjusting amount and tenure to compute scheme-specific returns with animations.
frontend/src/components/footer/Footer.ts: Footer showing current year, copyright, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/header/FrostedHe: Frosted header with title, IT 2.0 button opening a modal, and a location pill.
frontend/src/components/header/It20Modal: Modal describing IT 2.0 features with ESC handling and detailed text content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Simple layout wrapper providing a full‑height container for app content.
frontend/src/components/motto/RightEdgeM: Fixed right‑side vertical motto text displayed on large screens.
frontend/src/components/profile/BpmProfi: Expandable profile card showing a BPM’s photo and bio with typewriter effects.
frontend/src/components/profile/Typewrit: Typewriter-like animated text component that reveals lines sequentially.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeCa: Clickable scheme preview card showing icon, label, and description.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeGr: Displays a grid of all schemes and triggers callbacks on card clicks.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeMo: Modal showing full scheme details with tabs and a close button.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeTa: Tabbed interface presenting history, eligibility, benefits, documents, and calculator for a scheme.
frontend/src/components/schemes/useSchem: Custom hook managing scheme modal state and selected scheme.
frontend/src/components/support/CallFloa: Floating button enabling quick phone calls with animated effects.
frontend/src/components/support/WhatsApp: Floating WhatsApp contact button with tooltip and animations.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Scrolling marquee displaying duplicated customer testimonials.
frontend/src/data/schemes.ts: Defines scheme data structures, calculator configs, and the full schemes dataset.
frontend/src/data/testimonials.ts: Defines a Testimonial interface and exports a static list of six user testimonials with name, location, and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using react-query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a dark luxury theme using CSS variables with custom utilities like frosted glass and glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended utilities, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Project state description containing UI goals, design system requirements, known issues, and existing features for the India Post IT 2.0 site.
